connection.name: SalesforceConnection_soap
connection.description: Connection for Salesforce back-end using SOAP

group.name: custom
group.description: Custom variable to hold temporary server url for internal use only

map.name: store_provider_url_in_temp
map.description: Store Provider Url in temporary variable

map.displayName: Login call output 1 in case of fault
map.name: start_operation_output_3

connection.name: sagcloud_oauth_2_web_server_authentication
connection.description: Connection using OAuth 2.0 Web Server Authentication Flow

group.name: oauth_v20_authorization_code
group.description: Define configurations needed for the OAuth version 2.0 authentication scheme.

connection.name: sagcloud_oauth_v20_jwt
connection.description: Connection using OAuth 2.0 JWT Bearer Token Flow

group.name: oauth_v20_jwt
group.description: Define configurations needed for the OAuth version 2.0 authentication scheme.

map.name: operations_mapping_input_1
map.description: Session id to be used for all operations

map.name: accessTokenToSessionID
map.description: Session id to be used for all operations

map.name: JWTTokenToSessionID
map.description: Session id to be used for all operations

operation.name: login
operation.description: Login to the Salesforce.com SOAP Api

operation.name: describeDataCategoryGroups
operation.description: Describe all the data category groups available for a given set of types

operation.name: describeDataCategoryGroupStructures
operation.description: Describe the data category group structures for a given set of pair of types and data category group name

operation.name: describeDataCategoryMappings
operation.description: Describe the data category group mappings structures for a given set of pair of types and data category group name

operation.name: describeKnowledgeSettings
operation.description: Retrieves the Knowledge language settings in the organization

operation.name: describeLayout
operation.description: Describe the layout of an sObject

operation.name: describeSoqlListViews
operation.description: Retrieves the SOQL query and other information about a list view

operation.name: executeListView
operation.description: Executes a list view’s SOQL query to retrieve data, labels, and actions from a list view

operation.name: describeSoftphoneLayout
operation.description: Describe the layout of the SoftPhone

operation.name: describeTabs
operation.description: Describe the tabs that appear on a users page

operation.name: create
operation.description: Create a set of new sObjects

map.name: allowFieldTruncation
map.description: If this header value is true then it truncates data if the data is too long and does not fit into the given field

map.name: allOrNone
map.description: The AllOrNoneHeader header allows a call to roll back all changes unless all records are processed successfully

map.name: allowFieldTruncation
map.description: If this header value is true then it truncates data if the data is too long and does not fit into the given field

map.name: allOrNone
map.description: The AllOrNoneHeader header allows a call to roll back all changes unless all records are processed successfully

operation.name: upsert
operation.description: Update or insert a set of sObjects based on object id

map.name: allowFieldTruncation
map.description: If this header value is true then it truncates data if the data is too long and does not fit into the given field

map.name: allOrNone
map.description: The AllOrNoneHeader header allows a call to roll back all changes unless all records are processed successfully

operation.name: merge
operation.description: Merge and update a set of sObjects based on object id

operation.name: delete
operation.description: Delete a set of sObjects based on object id

parameter.name: businessObject
parameter.description: Specifies business object for which records have to be deleted

operation.name: emptyRecycleBin
operation.description: Empty a set of sObjects from the recycle bin

operation.name: process
operation.description: Submit an entity to a workflow process or process a workitem

operation.name: logout
operation.description: Logout the current user, invalidating the current session

operation.name: invalidateSessions
operation.description: Logs out and invalidates session ids

operation.name: getDeleted
operation.description: Get the IDs for deleted sObjects

operation.name: getUpdated
operation.description: Get the IDs for updated sObjects

map.name: batchSize
map.description: The batch size for the number of records returned in a query call.

parameter.name: select
parameter.description: custom select field list with optional subquery

parameter.name: filter
parameter.description: custom filter condition. If specified overrides 'where' and 'limit' parameters

operation.name: queryAll
operation.description: Create a Query Cursor, including deleted sObjects

parameter.name: select
parameter.description: custom select field list with optional subquery

parameter.name: filter
parameter.description: custom filter condition. If specified overrides 'where' and 'limit' parameters

operation.name: queryMore
operation.description: Gets the next batch of sObjects from a query

operation.name: getUserInfo
operation.description: Returns standard information relevant to the current user

operation.name: renderEmailTemplate
operation.description: Replaces merge fields in text bodies of email templates with values from Salesforce records, even for polymorphic fields

operation.name: findDuplicates
operation.description: Performs rule-based searches for duplicate records using array of sObjects

operation.name: findDuplicatesByIds
operation.description: Performs rule-based searches for duplicate records using array of IDs

operation.name: deleteByExample
operation.description: To delete big object data from your org using an sObject as a template for what to delete.

operation.name: createMultiple
operation.description: Create multiple set of new sObjects

map.name: allowFieldTruncation
map.description: If this header value is true then it truncates data if the data is too long and does not fit into the given field

map.name: allOrNone
map.description: The AllOrNoneHeader header allows a call to roll back all changes unless all records are processed successfully

map.name: allowFieldTruncation
map.description: If this header value is true then it truncates data if the data is too long and does not fit into the given field

map.name: allOrNone
map.description: The AllOrNoneHeader header allows a call to roll back all changes unless all records are processed successfully

listener.name: SalesforcePushTopicEvent
listener.description: Listens to incoming streaming notifications for changes to Salesforce data that match a SOQL query you define, in a secure and scalable way.

subscriber.name: PushTopic Subscriber
subscriber.description: Listens to a single PushTopic channel

listener.name: SalesforcePlatformEvent
listener.description: Listens to incoming platform event notifications for changes to Salesforce data that match a SOQL query you define, in a secure and scalable way.

listener.name: SalesforceCDCEvent
listener.description: Change Data Capture publishes change events, which represent changes to Salesforce records.

subscriber.name: ChangeDataCaptureEventSubscriber
subscriber.description: Listens to a Change Data Capture Event

listener.name: SalesforceGenericEvent
listener.description: Use generic events to send custom notifications that are not tied to Salesforce data changes. Use generic streaming when you want to send and receive custom notifications.
